translations: 窥淫癖者；喜好刺探隐私者（voyeur 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The media has made unfeeling voyeurs of all of us.
sentences.translation: 媒体已让我们所有人都变成冷酷无情的刺探他人隐私的人。

sentences.sentence: Most writers are voyeurs of a kind.
sentences.translation: 大部份作家都属某一种类型的窥秘者。

sentences.sentence: He also did much to turn Britons into a nation of voyeurs.
sentences.translation: 他的所作所为很大程度上激起了英国人的偷窥欲。
